findings.title: BC - Blacklists Addresses
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop addresses from transactions, which can be taken advantage of by calling the setBlockedAddress function.

findings.title: MVN - Îœisleading Variables Naming
findings.description: Variables have misleading names that do not accurately reflect the value they contain or the purpose they serve, leading to confusion and difficulty in reading and understanding the code.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not adhere to the Solidity style guide, which can lead to difficulties in readability and maintainability.
